Al-Jazeera reports Mr. Alassane Ouattara 's supporters have attacked people fleeing the country to Liberia. Some say they've been victims of a rebel group known as The New Power, which have been attacking anyone suspected of supporting Laurent Gbagbo. This refugee says, after the elections and after Alassane Ouattara won, the village knew he voted for Gbagbo. Since then he was told to leave or face attacks.
